# activatesAutomatically

**Instance Property**

A flag that indicates whether the coaching view activates automatically, depending on the current session state.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var activatesAutomatically: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. If enabled, the coaching overlay sets [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARCoachingOverlayView/isActive] automatically, depending on whether it needs user intervention to meet the current [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARCoachingOverlayView/goal-swift.property]. The coaching overlay activates when the session is initializing or when tracking conditions have degraded past a certain threshold.

## Activating the View

- **isActive**: A flag that indicates whether coaching is in progress.
- **setActive(_:animated:)**: Controls whether coaching is in progress.
